description:
Kozel was a battle experienced Imperial admiral of commoner background who worked in the Ministry of Intelligence. He was responsible for leading the investigation into the intelligence leaks from the Imperial Fleet, and Imperial Vice Admiral Christopf von Michaelsen was a suspect. He had planned to investigate more deeply using former colleagues and contacts of Michaelsen, such as Christopf von KÃ¶fenhiller, upon his return from the Second Battle of Tiamat.
Gineipedia
name: Kozel
